Html:
Composed and deployed QuickGraph PCL version for NuGet from latest sources here on CodePlex. It supports following platforms:
  • .NET Framework 4.0 Client +
  • Windows Store Apps (METRO) 8+
  • Windows Universal Apps (UWA) 8.1+
  • Silverlight 5
  • Windows Phone 8+
  • Windows Phone Silverlight 8.1
  • Xamarin iOS, Android, WP 10+
Get it at https://www.nuget.org/packages/QuickGraphPCL and please leave feedback if any problems will arise.
